actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to extend the availability of allotments to States for fiscal years 1998 through 2000, and for other purposes.
short_title: Children's Health Protection and Eligibility Act of 2002
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Children's Health Protection and Eligibility Act of 2002 - Amends title XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to: (1) provide for the retention and redistribution through FY 2003 of SCHIP allotments for FY 1998 through 2000; and (2) authorize qualifying States to use SCHIP funds for Medicaid expenditures.

titles.title: Children's Health Protection and Eligibility Act of 2002
A bill to amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to extend the availability of allotments to States for fiscal years 1998 through 2000, and for other purposes.
